question:
Consider the following schemes:
  1. SBIRI
  2. ASPIRE
  3. SFURTI
Which of the above encourage innovation in India?
explanation: Small Business Innovation Research Initiative (SBIRI) is an initiative under the Department of Biotechnology (DBT), Ministry of Science and Technology. It aims to stimulate technological innovation. A Scheme for Promotion of Innovation, Rural Industry and Entrepreneurship (ASPIRE) is an initiative under the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises. It aims to set up a network of technology canters, incubation centres to accelerate entrepreneurship and also to promote start-ups for innovation and entrepreneurship in rural and agriculture based industry. Scheme of Fund for Regeneration of Traditional Industries (SFURTI) is again an initiative under the Ministry of Micro, Small & Medium Enterprises. It aims to organize the traditional industries and artisans into clusters to enhance the marketability of products manufactured by artisans and to support their long term sustainability.
